text:
You can adapt this simple, click to reveal code -
<https://github.com/JayOram/interactive-email-code/blob/main/interactive-elements/click-to-reveal-EMAS22.html>

As it uses `input:checked` instead of class or `for=""` it has more support:

iOS/Apple Mail
Yahoo/AOL
Outlook for Mac
Thunderbird
Outlook app/Outlook webmail

You can use <details><summary> - <https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/details>

But last I checked only Apple Mail/iOS supports it - so I'd go with the above option.
I got the above from a friend over at the #emailgeeks slack community.
<@U048C858Y94> thank you for your suggestions. I did try the details tag, and as you mentioned it is not fully supported. I'll give the input option a try. Thank you :slightly_smiling_face:
